author: Will Isaza
description: Will’s inspiration: “Gloria cocktail is the culmination of career experiences influenced by personal flavours. It stems from the culinary inspiration of a ‘Bocadillo:’ a Colombian small bite usually comprising something sweet and savoury cheese. The name Gloria is the direct translation of ‘glory’ and is also the name of my mother. I was inspired to create a legacy that uses family, tradition, glory and BACARDÍ Añejo Cuatro rum. Using those four pillars of success, I hope to create much more than just a cocktail - better yet, a movement!”
name: Gloria (by Will Isaza)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
Combine equal parts by weight passion fruit puree and white sugar
Mix until sugar is fully dissolved
Over medium heat combine equal parts by weight white sugar and water
Add 6 cinnamon sticks and heat until sugar is fully dissolved
Combine 2 parts Cinnamon Syrup and 1 part Passion Fruit Syrup
